title: New: KOPPS – Dumb
body:
NY’s **KOPPS** follow on with their string of massive, unadulterated pop with latest single _Dumb_, which may be their most over-the-top yet.

It’s a brazen, satirical look at the idea of music, media and fame and while this sound isn’t for everyone, it’s earworm of a chorus coupled with the confidence of a Lady Gaga hit make it hard to ignore. Check it out below:

It’s a brazen, satirical look at the idea of music, media and fame and while this sound isn’t for everyone, it’s earworm of a chorus coupled with the confidence of a Lady Gaga \[…\]
